title: Healing Heartbreak
description:
Jillian and Cindy discuss the nature of true heartbreak and dig deep into their pasts to reveal how the patterns from our past repeat in our present - and how to stop the cycle and heal. 


This Week's Sponsors...

Go to Thirdlove.com/jillian for 15 percent off today!
